sql.where:
BOARD_NUM > 0
AND BOARD_TITLE
AND BOARD_CONTENTS
AND BOARD_WRITER
LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA( BOARD_NUM , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENTS , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , BOARD_CATEGORY , REF , STEP , DEPTH ) VALUES( NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{board_writer} , #{board_title} , #{board_contents} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 'Q' , NOTICE_SEQ.CURRVAL , 0 , 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA WHERE BOARD_NUM = ${board_num} AND DEL = 0
mapper.delete: UPDATE QNA SET DEL=1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{board_num}
